description:
The animal-costumed Nariyuki’s intrusion onto the stage brings Fumino’s play to an ending that has the crowd on its feet. Meanwhile, business is booming at Rizu’s class’s udon shop.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Post-Festival Celebration of X, Both Dazzling and Lonely
Matsuri no Owari wa Sabishiku mo Hanayaka ni [x] Domo o Shukufuku Suru
祭の終わりは寂しくも華やかに[x]どもを祝福する
